CustomField.description: This is an auto-calculated field that displays the minimum required number of points a member needs to move up to the next tier by the next reset period. This field is updated every time a member moves up or down a tier.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is an auto-calculated field that displays the minimum required number of points a member needs to move up to the next tier by the next reset period. This field is updated every time a member moves up or down a tier.
CustomField.label: Status Points To Next Tier
